episode_event_halloween_2021/4001_1001_0:
Hey, I think I see it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
This is where the Midnight Spookfest is gonna
take place!

I wonder if any other sync pairs have arrived
yet. Come on, let’s head inside!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4002_1001_0:
Huh... They really made this place feel like a
haunted house.

I feel like at any moment, something spooky could
sneak up and—
episode_event_halloween_2021/4002_0401_0:
You would mistake me for a ghost while I still
draw breath? Why, I should be insulted!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4002_0402_0:
Aye, young [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="sir" F="lady" ]! Verily am I the famed blade of
hardened steel!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4002_1001_0:
Sir Lear has asked me to welcome all participants
into the hall, so welcome you I shall!

Apparently, my striking visage is exactly what he
was looking for as the first face people see when
they walk through the door.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4002_1001_1: O-oh, I see... So this is all part of Lear’s plan.

Not gonna lie, I panicked a little when you crept
up behind me, Wikstrom.

Is that so? If the sight of my armor was enough
to strike terror in you, I fear you may suffer far
worse up ahead...

for within these halls, spine-chilling specters
and spooks await you around every corner!

Pssh, I’m not scared one bit! And actually, I was
just joking when I said I panicked earlier!

*chuckle* You put on quite a brave face,
young sir. Let’s see how long it lasts.

The main event hall is just up ahead. Steel
yourselves and march on, my friends!

May your courage never falter as you fight your
way to the very end!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_1001_0:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the
Midnight Spookfest!

I hope you all enjoy the very special Pokémon
battles we’ve prepared for you tonight!

Lear really went all out for this party, huh. It’s
like we’re part of some high society get-together
in a castle...

Are you all right? I couldn’t help noticing you
look a little anxious.

Are you nervous about walking through the villa
halls in the dark?

Wh-what? No way! Who’d be scared of something
silly like that?

It’s all of the glitz and glamor in this place...
I can’t relax in this environment.

I’m used to training in a quiet environment, so this
is quite strange for me.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_1001_1: Phew... I’m glad it’s not just me!
All this excitement is making me kinda thirsty...
Would you care for a beverage?

Should you need anything else, please don’t
hesitate to call me over.
Huh... Are you not attending to Caitlin tonight?
I hardly ever see you apart.

Yes... I shall endeavor to be as a shadow this
evening, watching over Lady Caitlin from a short
distance away.

Lavish gatherings like this must be a dime a
dozen where she comes from. She looks as
calm and cool as ever.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_1001_2:
Quite the contrary... Though Lady Caitlin may
appear that way to you, I would wager that
she’s actually quite excited right now.
Really? She doesn’t look any different to me...

Watch closely. You’ll notice she hasn’t yawned
even once today!

Speaking of Lady Caitlin, I have a favor I would
like to ask of you all...

If it’s not too much to ask, could you accompany
her tonight?

I’m certain Lady Caitlin would jump at the chance
to participate with your group, but she’s not in
the habit of inviting herself, you see...
Oh, is that all? We’d love to have her join us.

Your kindness knows no bounds. I shall take my
leave, then...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_1001_3:
Hey, Caitlin. Would you like to join us for the
event tonight?

We’re looking for a strong Trainer to fill out
our team.
You wish for me to join you?
Hmm... I think I’d like that.

You lot look awfully confident. Not that that’s
going to last much longer.

The fun’s about to begin! Try not to run off at
the first scare, all right?

We’re totally fine! Wikstrom wasn’t even that
scary at all.

I’m actually pretty excited to see what awaits
us ahead.

Hmph! Well, don’t come crying to me if it turns
out to be scarier than you think!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_1001_4:
There’s a magnificent prize waiting for the team
that can defeat the sync pair in the final room.

Prove your mettle and return here with the prize
in hand!
All right, then... Ready to go, everyone?
That prize is as good as ours!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_0401_4:
That’s the spirit. If we work together as a team,
I’m sure we’ll do just fine!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4003_0402_4:
That’s the spirit. If we work together as a team,
I’m sure we’ll do just fine!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_0: It’s quite dark in here, isn’t it.

I’m used to the dark, so this is pretty normal for
me. Are the rest of you doing all right?

Oh, I’m splendid. Do you think we’ll run into
something spooky soon?

Well, we already know there’s gonna be traps
and stuff. When we run into them, it probably
won’t even be...
Uhh...what’s that all over the walls?!

It looks like this room has been decorated
with masks...
Could they be party favors for the event?
Th-these are some weird party favors...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_0402_1: Y-yeah, I heard it! What do you think it was?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_1:
It sounded like someone knocked over a vase
to me.

Hm? I thought I just saw the eyes in those
masks sparkle...
Th-there are eyes in the masks?!
It sounded like a Pokémon’s cry.
How are both of you so c-calm right now?!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_2: I...don’t really know how to answer that.

Ah, it looks like the ghost Pokémon have come
out to welcome us.

If by “welcome” you mean bare their teeth in
open hostility toward us...
This could be an excellent training opportunity!

One day, a Legendary Pokémon will appear
before me. I have to train to prepare myself!
Looks like Banette is ready for a fight, too!
Of course! Now, let’s battle, shall we?
This Midnight Spookfest is my kind of party!

To rush at us out of the blue like that...
Ghost Pokémon are full of surprises, aren’t they.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_3:
Much of what you do is still a mystery to
me, Sableye.

I hope participating in the Spookfest allows me
to learn a bit more about you—and about ghost
Pokémon as well.

I still don’t understand how both of you are
so unfazed by all of this...
But we’ll do our best, too! Go, Mightyena!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_0301_3: Look! There are more of them!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_0401_3:
You OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
Come on, we’ll get through this together!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_0402_3:
Careful, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Just stay calm—we’ll face this together!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_3: I never knew ghost Pokémon were so aggressive...

If this is all just an act for the Spookfest, it sure
is a convincing one!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_4:
Phew... Nice job everybody. Looks like we
managed to drive them off.

Shall we brush ourselves off and get
moving again?

Let’s tread carefully. It might rush up and attack
like the last ones!

Hang on... I don’t sense any hostility from
this Pumpkaboo.
I don’t think it means to start a fight.
Perhaps it wants us to follow it.

Interesting... It could be trying to lead
us somewhere.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_5:
Hmm... What do you think we should do,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_0401_5:
*gulp* If you think that’s what we should do,
then I guess I’m with you...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4004_1001_5: What are we waiting for? Let’s go.
We’ll be fine as long as we all stick together.
I wonder where it’ll lead us...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4005_1001_0: How did we get to this cave from the villa?

Pumpkaboo are said to carry wandering spirits to
the place they belong so that they can move on.
This place could be a bridge to the afterlife...

You think it might be trying to usher our spirits
away with it?

Wha—?! Now’s not the time for calm analysis,
you two!
I propose we turn back and get out of here...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4006_1001_0:
I didn’t think I’d be guided into the afterlife
this evening...

You could have at least mentioned that
Pumpkaboo like to carry spirits to their
resting place, you know...

Well, I thought it might be rude to say no if
that’s what it was really trying to do.

Are all ghost Pokémon Trainers accustomed to
this sort of thing, I wonder?
I’m sure it depends on the person...

*sigh* I guess this event turned out to be a lot
more grim than we thought, huh...

I hope we find the sync pair waiting in the
final room soo—
Ahh! I think something just touched my leg!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4006_1001_1:
Do you think someone might have dropped it?
Or is this just another decoration like that
other room...

Hard to say. We might as well bring it with us,
though, in case somebody lost it.

This has been quite a journey so far...but if I’m
not mistaken, that should be the final room
up ahead.
Finally! That felt like it took forever...

Ahem... Entering the room may prove to be a
bit difficult.

It was probably placed here as a warden to
keep us out.

All that’s left to do is bust through this obstacle
and make our way through the final door!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4006_1001_2:
A grand battle such as this calls for grace and
elegance!

Hm? Whatever is the matter, Sableye? Don’t you
want to battle?
Sorry, could we pause for a moment, everyone?

Sableye...I want to understand you better.
Please, do what you think is right. We’ll wait.

That Gengar didn’t budge an inch from the door
when our Pokémon were attacking it.

There could be something else at play here...
Something unrelated to the event.
Can you understand what they’re saying, Caitlin?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4006_1001_3:
Not exactly...but I think I got the gist of what
they’re trying to convey.

Gengar is going to step aside for us. It seems
very concerned about the mask we picked up
in the other room.

So it just wants us to bring the mask inside
with us? Well, that was easy.

You were brilliant, Sableye. Thanks to you, we
can all move ahead.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4007_1001_0: Wha—?! How’d we get outside again?

The ghost Pokémon may be using their power to
warp reality in this place.
*sniffle* What am I going to do...
Wait, Caitlin! It could be dangerous!
Hello... Why are you all alone over here?
Mask? Are you referring to this?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4007_1001_1: Oh... All right, then. Here you go.
Aren’t you that Gym Leader from...Galar, was it?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_1001_0:
Yes... Allister, the Gym Leader from the Galar
region. I thought I recognized you!

We heard that we’d get a fabulous prize if we
could defeat the sync pair in this room...
Do you know anything about that?
Y-yeah... It’s me who’s in charge of it...
What? So you’re here as part of Lear’s big plan?
Lear approached us... M-me and Gengar...

For the Midnight Spookfest... He wanted us
to...to play a part in it...

N-nothing too scary... Just enough to make it
fun for the participants and the ghost Pokémon...
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_1001_1:
I was really excited...to do something n-nice for
all the ghost Pokémon...

And I... I wasn’t really paying attention...
and I lost my mask somewhere along the way...

I’ve got loads of spares... Spare masks, I mean.
B-but I couldn’t leave to go and get them...

I’m... I’m afraid...to show my face to other people
without my mask on...

I see... With all the participants making their way
to this room, you were bound to run into someone.

And then, even if you did make it safely to your
mask storage, you may have found it empty.

I think someone might have mistaken your masks
for party decorations... We saw a bunch of them
hanging up on the walls.

That reminds me, is this Gengar your
partner Pokémon?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_1001_2:
Y-yeah... Gengar could tell how frightened I was
to leave this room...

So I think he ran off with the other ghost Pokémon
t-to chase away all the participants.

So THAT’S why all the ghost Pokémon have been
acting so aggressive toward us...

D-don’t blame the ghost Pokémon! It’s not
their fault...

They were doing it for my sake... Please don’t
hate them...
Oh, I could never hate them.

In fact, what they did for you was so kind...
I may love them even more now.

Yeah. I think I understand why things went the
way they did tonight.

My partner and I got some excellent training out
of it, so I can’t complain.

However...I think you may have inadvertently
given the other participants quite a scare.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_1001_3: Eep... I was afraid of that...

So now we need to work extra hard to show
them all how wonderful ghost Pokémon can be!
I mean this party isn’t over yet!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_0401_3: You want me...to join the party?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_0302_3: Let’s meet back up with everyone!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4008_0402_3: You want me...to go with you?
episode_event_halloween_2021/4009_1001_0: Er... I wanted to say, I... I didn’t mean to...
What? Tonight’s been sooo much fun!

No need to apologize! We’re all aware of
what happened.

Young [Name:PlayerNickname ] and the others
explained it to us before you arrived.

We’ve all been waiting for you and the ghost
Pokémon to grace us with your presence!

I... Thank you for doing that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

Now, then! With that small kerfuffle out of the
way, let the party continue!
episode_event_halloween_2021/4009_1001_1:
Go on and enjoy the rest of the Midnight
Spookfest with everyone!

Woo-hoo! Allister, bring the ghost Pokémon
over here!

Come on, Allister! I want to introduce you
to everyone!

Was what you said to Allister earlier true?
That you love ghost Pokémon even more now?
I always speak from my heart.

I want to learn so much more about ghost
Pokémon and the people that train them.

Yes. Having become one myself, nothing would
make me happier.
episode_event_halloween_2021/4009_1001_2: I see... I’m glad to hear that.

Welcome to the wonderful world of ghost
Pokémon, Caitlin!

There’s just one thing this party is missing...
Dancing.

Dancing? I, uh... I’ve never been much of
a dancer...

Come now—what’s a party without a little
dancing? Let’s all go and dance together.

The key is to not overthink it. All that matters
is having a good time with your Pokémon.

Just make sure your dancing isn’t so yawn-
inducing that I grow bored. *giggle*
